name: Sniper Shot: City Commando
description:
Be a true incredible shooting hunter in this brutal killer war to assassinate terrorist, gangsters & enemies hidden around to bring back peace of your city

Features:
- Ultra Realistic gameplay for a better user experience.
- Realistic High Definition (HD) Display.
- Smooth and easy controls for a better gameplay.
- Hit the terrorist’s settlement.
- Become the sniper counter terrorist force and kill all terrorists.
